author: Ricardo Moreira
body:
# **What it is?**

My first approach to Nuxt.js. I used Netlify as a CMS. It was my first website that was planned to be used in production. For now is it on hold (from the customer side) but I will going to improve it in the meanwhile.



## What I learned?

* Nuxt
* Vue.js
* CMS
* Netlify

## Links

* [Project page](https://cranky-lichterman-91ec08.netlify.app/)
* [GitHub page](https://github.com/mugas/ruckwater)
